text: -diti# lOmaqtastasya# mimItaiqtadvai pa#SUqnA(gm) rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqvAsmai# paqSUnava# rundhE paSuqmAnEqva Ba#vatyaqpAmantE$ krINAtiq sara#samEqvaina#M krINAtyaq-mAtyOq&sItyA#hAqmaivaina#M kurutE SuqkrastEq grahaq ityA#ha SuqkrO hya#syaq grahO &naqsA&cCa# yAti mahiqmAna#-mEqvAsyAcCa# yAqtyanaqsA - [  ] 61
